title: I love being the support, and being blamed for losing the game.
body:
My adc and mid die off almost immediately because they are incapable of dodging anything, or making a difference in any teamfight, and as lux, I burst my combo kill off their adc and support and wipe down their entire team to like 40% health and I'm expected to run in immediately afterward on complete CD to do what? Use harsh language? Use my Lux laugh on them?

Despite the fact that I'm the only reason we were ahead, and the only source of damage, they say to report me and that I'm bad. lol I mean, whatever.
